SqlString.String: select T.UNIT_ID ShopID, T.NAME, O.UNIT_ID OwnerID, o.name OwnerName, T.HIERARCHY, P.DESCRIPTION PROVINCE, C.DESCRIPTION CITY FROM MTSBW.SYS_UNIT T INNER JOIN MTSBW.SYS_UNIT_CLSF TS ON T.UNIT_ID = TS.UNIT_ID INNER JOIN MTSBW.SHOP S ON T.UNIT_ID = S.SHOP_ID INNER JOIN MTSBW.SYS_CODE P ON T.PROVINCE = P.CODE AND P.CODE_CLASS = 'PROVINCE_CODE' INNER JOIN MTSBW.SYS_CODE C ON T.CITY = C.CODE AND C.CODE_CLASS = 'CITY_CODE' INNER JOIN MTSBW.SYS_UNIT O ON T.OWNER_ID = O.UNIT_ID WHERE TS.UNIT_TYPE = 'SH' AND TS.STATUS = 'A' AND NVL(S.CLOSE_DATE, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE
